code:
%% Use Case Diagram
%% Shows all primary use cases for E-Clean platform
%% Export at 300 DPI for report

graph LR
    Client((Client))
    Cleaner((Cleaner))
    Admin((Admin))

    subgraph "Job Management"
        UC1[Post Job for Bidding]
        UC2[Send Direct Offer]
        UC3[Accept Bid]
        UC4[Monitor Job Progress]
        UC5[Handle Overdue Job]
    end

    subgraph "Bidding & Offers"
        UC6[Submit Bid]
        UC7[Accept Direct Offer]
        UC8[Decline Direct Offer]
    end

    subgraph "Job Execution"
        UC9[Execute Job with Photos]
        UC10[Upload Before Photos]
        UC11[Upload After Photos]
    end

    subgraph "Payment & Review"
        UC12[Process Payment]
        UC13[Review and Rate Cleaner]
        UC14[Receive Payout]
    end

    subgraph "Communication"
        UC15[Send Chat Message]
        UC16[Receive Notifications]
    end

    subgraph "Administration"
        UC17[Moderate Disputed Job]
        UC18[Process Manual Refund]
    end

    %% Client use cases
    Client --> UC1
    Client --> UC2
    Client --> UC3
    Client --> UC4
    Client --> UC5
    Client --> UC12
    Client --> UC13
    Client --> UC15
    Client --> UC16

    %% Cleaner use cases
    Cleaner --> UC6
    Cleaner --> UC7
    Cleaner --> UC8
    Cleaner --> UC9
    Cleaner --> UC10
    Cleaner --> UC11
    Cleaner --> UC14
    Cleaner --> UC15
    Cleaner --> UC16

    %% Admin use cases
    Admin --> UC17
    Admin --> UC18

    %% Include relationships
    UC3 -.->|includes| UC12
    UC9 -.->|includes| UC10
    UC9 -.->|includes| UC11
    UC13 -.->|triggers| UC14

    %% Extend relationships
    UC4 -.->|extends| UC5

    classDef actorStyle fill:#E3F2FD,stroke:#1976D2,stroke-width:2px
    classDef ucStyle fill:#FFF3E0,stroke:#F57C00,stroke-width:2px

    class Client,Cleaner,Admin actorStyle
    class UC1,UC2,UC3,UC4,UC5,UC6,UC7,UC8,UC9,UC10,UC11,UC12,UC13,UC14,UC15,UC16,UC17,UC18 ucStyle
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。
